machinery package¶

machinery.virtualbox¶

class machinery.virtualbox.VirtualBox[source]¶

Bases: lib.cuckoo.common.abstracts.Machinery

Virtualization layer for VirtualBox.

ABORTED = 'aborted'¶
ERROR = 'machete'¶
POWEROFF = 'poweroff'¶
RUNNING = 'running'¶
SAVED = 'saved'¶
dump_memory(label, path)[source]¶

Takes a memory dump.

Parameters

path – path to where to store the memory dump.

dump_pcap(label, task)[source]¶

Dump the pcap for this analysis through the VirtualBox integrated nictrace functionality. This is useful in scenarios where multiple Virtual Machines are talking with each other in the same subnet (which you normally don’t see when tcpdump’ing on the gatway).

start(label, task)[source]¶

Start a virtual machine.

Parameters

  • label – virtual machine name.

  • task – task object.

Raises

CuckooMachineError – if unable to start.

stop(label)[source]¶

Stops a virtual machine.

Parameters

label – virtual machine name.

Raises

CuckooMachineError – if unable to stop.

machinery.vmware¶

class machinery.vmware.VMware[source]¶

Bases: lib.cuckoo.common.abstracts.Machinery

Virtualization layer for VMware Workstation using vmrun utility.

LABEL = 'vmx_path'¶
dump_memory(vmx_path, path)[source]¶

Take a memory dump of the machine.

start(vmx_path, task)[source]¶

Start a virtual machine.

Parameters

  • vmx_path – path to vmx file.

  • task – task object.

Raises

CuckooMachineError – if unable to start.

stop(vmx_path)[source]¶

Stops a virtual machine.

Parameters

vmx_path – path to vmx file

Raises

CuckooMachineError – if unable to stop.
